00090 /* ----------------public, exported defines -------------------- */
00091 #define SND_READ_ONLY   0   
00092 #define SND_WRITE_ONLY  1   
00093 #define SND_READ_WRITE  2   
00094 #define SND_MONO        1   /* don't change! Anzahl der Kanaele, Mono */
00095 #define SND_STEREO      2   /* don't change! Anzahl der Kanaele, Stereo */

00256 /* WAV file routines for windows/linux. It is assumed,
00257    that the WAV file has a simple header consisting of only a
00258    format-chunk and a data-chunk, as is shown in the struct below:
00259 */
00260 
00261 
00289 typedef struct{
00290     unsigned long main_chunk;   
00291     unsigned long length;       
00292     unsigned long chunk_type;   
00293     unsigned long sub_chunk;    
00294     unsigned long sub_length;   
00295     unsigned short format;      
00296     unsigned short nChannels;   
00298     unsigned long nSamplesPerSec;
00299     unsigned long nBytesPerSec;  
00300     unsigned short nBytesPerSample; 
00303     unsigned short nBitsPerSample;
00306     unsigned long data_chunk;     
00307     unsigned long data_length;    
00308 } sndWaveHeader_t;
